original_text: “These are the appointed feasts of the Lord, the holy convocations, which you shall proclaim at the time appointed for them.
korean_text: 이것이 너희가 그 정한 때에 성회로 공포할 여호와의 절기들이니라

sentences.original_text: These are the appointed feasts of the Lord
which you shall proclaim at the time appointed for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 정한 때에 선포할 것이니라
